body_html: If you have old version of CUDA, the library link may point to the old library even you install the newer CUDA especially if you install it manually. Try delete your old installation, and then sudo ldconfig to update the dynamic links.
body_text: If you have old version of CUDA, the library link may point to the old library even you install the newer CUDA especially if you install it manually. Try delete your old installation, and then sudo ldconfig to update the dynamic links.
body: If you have old version of CUDA, the library link may point to the old library even you install the newer CUDA especially if you install it manually. Try delete your old installation, and then sudo ldconfig to update the dynamic links.
